meta.name: Armenia - Turkmenistan BIT (1996)
meta.comments: On 19.03.1996 two agreements were signed with Turkmenistan: agreement on cooperation in the field of public health <http://www.parliament.am/library/erkoxm/1996-1998/7.pdf>, and an agreement on exchange of legal information <http://www.parliament.am/library/erkoxm/1996-1998/8.pdf>. No BIT
